entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
